sentences.en: He thought that the feeling is better to compete here than the testing racecourse.
sentences.cn: 他认爲在这里比赛的感觉比以前的测试赛事更好.

sentences.en: In former days there was a racecourse here.
My house backs onto the racecourse.
sentences.cn: 我家房子后面与赛马场为邻.

sentences.en: My main complaint is that we can't go out on the racecourse anymore.
sentences.cn: 我投诉的主要问题是我们没法再去外面的赛道了。

sentences.en: On racecourse's Hamilton an inch, his radical surmounting already had even caused the matches hostility.
sentences.cn: 赛道上的汉密尔顿是寸步不让的, 他的激进超越甚至已经引起了对手们的敌意.

sentences.en: One lady, Rachel, had her ashes scattered on Ascot racecourse.
sentences.cn: 一位小姐, 雷切尔, 她的骨灰已散落在阿斯科特赛马场.

sentences.en: Racecourse's changeable, also increased rally's uncertainty, this is precisely the automobile movement charm is.
sentences.cn: 赛道的多变, 也增加了拉力赛的不确定性, 这正是汽车运动的魅力所在.

sentences.en: So it was with a certain ebullience that 7,000 residents of Wuhan recently gathered at the Orient Lucky City racecourse to indulge in what the central leadership terms a “social evil”.
sentences.cn: 因此，最近7000名武汉居民沸沸扬扬，齐聚东方马城赛马场，全情投入在被中央领导人称作的“社会祸害”里。

sentences.en: The going was heavy at the racecourse.
The law of the land said you could only bet at a racecourse.
sentences.cn: 当时的法律规定只能在赛马场下赌.

sentences.en: The racecourse borders the city on the east.
There is a public enclosure of a racecourse.
sentences.cn: 那儿有个作赛马场的公共圈地.

sentences.en: There is a public enclosure of racecourse.
sentences.cn: 那儿有个作赛马场“的”“公共”圈地.

sentences.en: There will be two separate starting points for the coaches - Stamford Bridge and Kempton Park Racecourse.
sentences.cn: 到时长途汽车将有2个分离的出发点 —— 斯坦福桥和开普顿公园赛马场.

sentences.en: This is a very wide racecourse.
sentences.cn: 这是一条非常宽的跑道.

sentences.en: This racecourse stressed the soil fertility to make the profound impression to the young Chinese.
sentences.cn: 这个赛道的抓地力给小汉留下了深刻的印象.

words.tran_cn: （赛车用的）跑道；（水车等的）水沟

trans.tran_cn: 赛马场，跑马场，赛船水道，跑道
trans.tran_en: a grass track on which horses race
